website_summaries.verdict: Toddlers can level up their basic reading skills with this fun and very affordable tracing tablet that’s loaded with extra features.
pros: Pencil and tablet fit toddlers’ hands perfectly

cons: Tracing and drawing screen is low resolution, not backlit and small

website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic tool for teaching younger children to write. Excellent quality from a trusted brand.

cons: Great for teaching smaller children writing basics, but beyond that the settings are somewhat limited

product_meta.title: LeapFrog Mr. Pencil's Scribble & Write (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Have fun writing letters, numbers and more with the Mr. Pencils scribble and write! With the help of friendly Mr. Pencil, explore six activities that will introduce writing, drawing and spelling. Step by step, Mr. Pencil will show how to write numbers, shapes, uppercase letters and lowercase letters. Use the stylus on the touch screen to trace the numbers, letters and shapes and Mr. Pencil will provide instant feedback. Tap the screen to make your writing come alive with cute animations. Then get creative and use the stylus to draw anything you want! Mr. Pencil will also introduce early spelling by asking you to match letters to their sounds or to find missing letters to spell simple words. Writing is fun and interactive with Mr. Pencil! This interactive toy requires 3 AA batteries (included for demo purposes only, replace new ones for regular use).
feature_bullets: Explore six activities that introduce writing, drawing and spelling with the help of Mr. Pencil
